segments.text: what do you think about all the different diets people go on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think dieting is good for you . It's much better to eat a balanced diet and to never get overweight to begin with !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: but what do you think about people who are obese ? What should they do to lose weight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: they need to eat healthy foods , but they also have to increase the amount of exercise they do every day . They don't have to cut out fattening foods altogether , though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: so you think it's ok for people who are dieting to eat chocolate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , they can eat some chocolate . As long as they are exercising and eating mostly healthy foods , there's nothing wrong with having a small desert .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: many people gain weight by drinking far too much soda . Soda should be a treat ; there's simply no nutritional value in it whatsoever . If you want to lose weight and you can't stop drinking soda , try
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's good advice . Have you ever tried taking vitamins ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: my mother used to make me take vitamins every day , but I don't take them anymore . Vitamins are good as a supplement , but they don't do much good if you don't have a well-balanced diet to start .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how do you know so much about food and dieting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you might not believe this , but I used to be twice the size than I am now !
segments.speaker: S2
